# Abhinav Rajesh - Portfolio

> Full-stack Software Engineer | Frontend Developer @ Victoria's Secret & Co.
> https://abhinavrajesh.com
> Last updated: February 4, 2026

## Overview

Abhinav Rajesh is a full-stack software engineer based in India, currently working as a Frontend Developer at Victoria's Secret & Co. He specializes in building fast, accessible, and user-friendly web experiences with expertise spanning from frontend to backend development.

**Core Focus**: Building fast, accessible web experiencesâ€”front to back

**Current Role**: Frontend Developer at Victoria's Secret & Co. (June 2023 - Present)

**Location**: India

**Education**: Bachelor of Technology in Computer Science, School of Engineering, CUSAT (2019-2023, GPA: 9.05/10)

## Site Structure

This portfolio website is built with Next.js 15 and TypeScript, showcasing Abhinav's professional work, personal projects, and technical writing.

### Main Sections

**Home (/)**
- Hero section with professional introduction and current role
- Complete work experience timeline
- Educational background
- Quick overview of expertise and achievements

**About (/about)**
- Detailed personal biography and professional philosophy
- Real-time Spotify integration showing current/recent listening activity
- Personal interests and values
- Contact information and social links

**Projects (/projects)**
- Showcase of major personal and professional projects
- Each project includes detailed case studies with tech stack, achievements, and metrics
- Live demos and GitHub repositories
- 4 featured projects with significant user impact

**Notes (/notes)**
- Technical blog posts and articles
- Tutorials on web development topics
- Code examples and practical implementations
- Topics include React, Next.js, JavaScript fundamentals, CSS/SASS, and more
- Links to older blog content at blog.abhinavrajesh.com

## Work Experience

### Victoria's Secret & Co.
**Role**: Frontend Developer
**Duration**: June 2023 - Present
**Location**: Remote, India

**Key Achievements**:
- Increased user retention by 10% through comprehensive accessibility improvements (WCAG AA compliance, semantic HTML, ARIA labels, keyboard navigation)
- Delivered $13.6M business impact through "Keep me signed in" feature implementation
- Generated $12.6M business impact by implementing OTP authentication for user verification
- Saved $70K annually by migrating analytics from Tealium to EDDL (Event-Driven Data Layer)
- Built and maintained customer-facing e-commerce features for a Fortune 500 company
- Worked with React, Next.js, TypeScript, and modern frontend tooling

### GitHub (Consultant)
**Role**: Consultant
**Duration**: January 2024 - October 2024
**Location**: Remote

**Key Achievements**:
- Built the official GitHub Constellation India 2024 website
- Created platform serving millions of developers across India
- Delivered high-performance, accessible web experience for major developer conference
- Worked with Next.js, TypeScript, and GitHub's design systems

### GitHub
**Role**: Developer Relations Engineer Intern
**Duration**: February 2022 - June 2023
**Location**: Remote

**Key Achievements**:
- Built and launched githubindia.com, serving over 10 million developers in India
- Developed githubbrasil.com, reaching 3 million+ developers in Brazil
- Created localized content and experiences for regional developer communities
- Collaborated with cross-functional teams on developer advocacy initiatives
- Worked with React, Next.js, and content management systems

### GrowthCX
**Role**: Software Engineer Intern
**Duration**: March 2021 - January 2022
**Location**: Remote

**Key Achievements**:
- Built the complete frontend for SuiteJar, a B2B SaaS product
- Developed user interfaces for business analytics and customer experience tools
- Worked with React, TypeScript, and modern frontend frameworks
- Collaborated with backend team on API integration and data visualization

## Featured Projects

### Aura - Mood Tracking Application
**Description**: A comprehensive mood tracking application that helps users understand and improve their mental well-being through daily mood logging, pattern analysis, and insights.

**Tech Stack**: Next.js, React, TypeScript, TailwindCSS, Supabase (PostgreSQL), Vercel

**Key Metrics**:
- 600+ active users
- 100+ upvotes on ProductHunt
- 45+ GitHub stars
- Featured on multiple developer communities

**Impact**: Helps users track their emotional patterns, identify triggers, and make data-driven decisions about their mental health.

**Links**:
- Project page: https://abhinavrajesh.com/projects/aura
- Live demo: Available on project page
- GitHub: github.com/AbhinavRajesh (check repositories)

### Chatbotish - Website Chat Widget
**Description**: An embeddable chat widget for websites that enables easy integration of conversational interfaces. Helps businesses add chat functionality to their websites without complex backend infrastructure.

**Tech Stack**: React, TypeScript, WebSocket, Node.js, MongoDB

**Key Metrics**:
- 1,000+ website visits
- 65+ upvotes on ProductHunt
- 25+ GitHub stars
- Used by multiple small businesses and personal websites

**Impact**: Simplifies customer support and user engagement for website owners with an easy-to-integrate chat solution.

**Links**:
- Project page: https://abhinavrajesh.com/projects/chatbotish
- Live demo: Available on project page

### CryptoStack - Decentralized Q&A Platform
**Description**: A blockchain-based question-and-answer platform with integrated NFT marketplace. Built on decentralized technologies to create a transparent, community-driven knowledge sharing platform.

**Tech Stack**: Next.js, Solidity, Ethereum, IPFS, Web3.js, Hardhat

**Key Achievement**: 
- 2nd Prize winner in ByteSynergy Hackathon
- Innovative combination of Q&A functionality with NFT rewards
- Demonstrates expertise in Web3 and blockchain development

**Impact**: Showcases potential for decentralized knowledge sharing with token-based incentive mechanisms.

**Links**:
- Project page: https://abhinavrajesh.com/projects/cryptostack
- GitHub: Available on project page

### Sahaay - COVID-19 Resource Finder
**Description**: Emergency resource finder built during the COVID-19 pandemic to help people in India find critical medical resources including hospital beds, oxygen cylinders, medicines, and ambulances.

**Tech Stack**: Next.js, React, TypeScript, Firebase, Google Maps API

**Key Metrics**:
- 1,500+ website visits during peak pandemic period
- 60+ upvotes on ProductHunt
- Helped connect people with life-saving medical resources
- Featured in local news and community groups

**Impact**: Provided critical service during emergency situation, helping families find medical resources when they needed them most.

**Links**:
- Project page: https://abhinavrajesh.com/projects/sahaay

## Technical Stack

### Frontend Technologies
- **Framework**: Next.js 15.3.8 (App Router, React Server Components)
- **UI Library**: React 19.0.0
- **Language**: TypeScript 5 (strict mode)
- **Styling**: TailwindCSS v4 with custom design system
- **UI Components**: Lucide React icons, custom component library
- **Fonts**: Work Sans (Google Fonts), monospace for headings

### Content & Data Management
- **Content**: MDX via next-mdx-remote for blog posts and project pages
- **Code Highlighting**: sugar-high for syntax highlighting
- **Database**: Redis (ioredis) for caching and data storage
- **APIs**: Spotify API integration for real-time music status

### Performance & Analytics
- **Analytics**: Vercel Analytics, Google Analytics
- **Performance**: Vercel Speed Insights, custom Web Vitals tracking
- **Optimization**: Image optimization, code splitting, lazy loading
- **SEO**: Automatic sitemap generation, robots.txt, Open Graph images

### Development Tools
- **Version Control**: Git, GitHub
- **Code Quality**: ESLint, Prettier
- **Build Tools**: Next.js build system, Turbopack for development
- **Deployment**: Vercel (serverless, edge functions)
- **CI/CD**: Automated deployments via Vercel

### Additional Integrations
- **Third-party**: Google Analytics (@next/third-parties)
- **Utilities**: clsx, tailwind-merge for className management
- **Type Safety**: Full TypeScript coverage with strict configuration

## Technical Writing & Blog

Abhinav maintains a technical blog with articles covering practical web development topics:

**Sample Articles**:
- "How I Built CLI Version of Wordle Game" - Tutorial on building command-line games with Node.js
- "Adding SASS/SCSS to Your React/Next.js Application" - Guide to styling in modern React applications
- "Difference Between Call, Bind, Apply" - JavaScript fundamentals explained

**Topics Covered**:
- React and Next.js best practices
- JavaScript fundamentals and advanced concepts
- CSS, SASS, and modern styling approaches
- Web development tutorials and guides
- Building real-world applications

**Blog Links**:
- Current blog/notes: https://abhinavrajesh.com/notes
- Older blog content: https://blog.abhinavrajesh.com

## Additional Information

### Design Philosophy
- Performance-first approach to web development
- Strong emphasis on accessibility and inclusive design
- User experience as primary focus
- Clean, minimal design aesthetic with attention to detail
- Mobile-first responsive design

### Professional Approach
- Focused on delivering measurable business impact
- Data-driven decision making
- Continuous learning and skill development
- Open source contribution and community engagement
- Building products that solve real user problems

### Portfolio Features
- **SEO Optimized**: Automatic sitemap generation, proper meta tags, Open Graph images
- **Performance**: Optimized images, code splitting, edge caching
- **Accessibility**: WCAG AA compliant, semantic HTML, keyboard navigation
- **Analytics**: Integrated tracking for user insights and performance monitoring
- **Modern Stack**: Built with latest Next.js 15 and React 19 features

## About This Portfolio

This is the fourth iteration of Abhinav's portfolio, built with Next.js and MDX. The portfolio was inspired by chanhdai.com and represents a modern approach to developer portfolios with a focus on performance, accessibility, and clean design.

**Tech Highlights**:
- Next.js 15 with App Router and React Server Components
- Full TypeScript implementation
- MDX for content management
- TailwindCSS v4 for styling
- Custom design system with consistent patterns
- Real-time integrations (Spotify API)
- Comprehensive analytics and performance tracking

The portfolio serves as both a professional showcase and a demonstration of modern web development best practices, featuring enterprise-level code quality and attention to detail in both design and implementation.

---

For more information or to get in touch with Abhinav Rajesh, visit https://abhinavrajesh.com or reach out via email at abhinavrajesh49@gmail.com
